The only fitted real nice and loose fitting pants 👖 that fit the right length of your body and fit perfectly on your face.

Good material. Nice thickness where its not too hot in summer but thick enough for Los Angeles winter. I use as work pants. Has been washed and dryed several times and still has good color. I work in IT so the extra pockets are a plus.

Fit was good but there was fake two inch strips on front pocket covers. They even had snap buttons on them . Two on each pocket covers, but there was no matching male shape to connect it to.  Why were they there. Also the front pockets were to large.
Nice fit. A tad too snug for me.
These pants are so comfortable! Recommend!

I find out after trying them and needing to go the bathroom that there is no front flap. I have to pull the pants down to take a pee - this of course after tightening the waist band. What am I, 10 years old?!?!?  Buyer be very aware
Very thin material. Pretty cheap looking. was thinking I was getting more sweat pant/ athletic style feel but not so much.
Waist too big, elastic not tight my pants fell to the floor
These pants are comfy and you can wear them every day or for dress up

I’m very pleased with these pants.  The fit, style and feel work for me.  They also wash very nicely.  I’m a short, female with extra (skin/fat) around the middle. The elastic waistband allowed me to order the size to fit my legs not my waist (smaller size!)
True to size and my husband weighs 275 and his height is 6”7 he loves these pants

I got these for my son for his school uniform for the hotter months and they're SUPER nice and thin and fit great! He has black, grey and khaki and I plan to get more! He's 5' 3" and a small fits perfectly!

评论概述: Fits great, pockets are deep enough to secure my stuff without fear that they may slide out.
评论详情: I like that my legs remain cool while wearing this.

Most of the time any kind of sweatpants cargo pants, anything that I don't require a belt for I usually get a medium and it usually fits great. However, I ordered a medium in this and I could fit 3 of me in one Pant. Leg. It was too big. It literally looks like I'm wearing mc. Hammer pants...

Comfortable for warehouse

These are the perfect pair to wear around the house and do nothing. They are comfortable and can be easily slipped on. There are pockets on the sides of the legs (cargo pants style) and bungee cords on the pant bottom--in case you want to close the gap where your shoes meet the pants, while hiking or camping. They are bit long for me, so make sure you take your measurements closely. There are 2 small straps located on the side pockets that simply dangle on the legs. I'm not sure of their function. They have a button, but there is no receiving end for the button. I'm not sure if they're purely design or what. It  is drawstring,  so that adds to the comfort. They are great value and perfect to wear around the house.
Really baggy and dark pockets have useless button on a flap that connects to nothing looks stupid made good jammus though

The cargo pockets on the legs have the upper cap part of snaps but not the lower part of the snap to connect to, so they just dangle there. One of the weirdest things I've ever seen. I guess this is why you don't buy off brands.

The waist is nice and it slips on great. A bit warm because the fabric hugs the skin and the inseam is a tad stiff.  I can’t see myself doing the splits or squating in them or the thin crotch is sure to tear. Velcro pockets on the legs and one Velcro pocket on the right butt cheek. Waist pockets feel a bit thin and might tear if you put sharp objects in there. Overall it’s tolerable for every day leisure use but definitely not for vigorous activity.
